name: SocialSensr
overview:
SocialSensr offers a full suite Social Media Management System, designed by leading social media experts.

Our Mission? Taking you to the next level in social media management

SocialSensr integrates software and services and will actively help organizations benefit from social media technology to maximize Social ROI.

SocialSensr is thrilled to bring you:

SocialSoftware: A full suite Social Media Management System, designed by leading social media experts. It focusses far most on effective contentmarketing.

SocialService: Meeting our own -high- expectations, you can expect quick and clear response to your support questions.

SocialStudy: We convert the latest social strategies and business cases to e-learning programs so you can increase your knowledge, and test and apply your improved skills.

SocialSpecialist:To top it all, we offer you strategic advice from a SocialSpecialist, a personal sparring partner, who gives you valuable feedback and helps you implement and activate campaigns within SocialSensr.
